channel.title: [Help Please] Quest Tab + Clickable Cmds
channel.description:
Mkay guys this has been annoying me because I cant figure it out. lol
This is regarding the quest tab.
My server has a text lets say "Achievement Diary" its in the quest tab where the quests usually go. And when I click it, it replaces the quest tab with, say, another quests tab with the achievement diary stuff on it.
I want to be able to make another text like that in the quests tab but called "Commands List" So when I click it, it will bring up a new quests tab of commands that I will have in there to give items when you click it, like "barrows" etc.
Problem: Is pretty much I dont know how to make a clickable text that will bring up a new quest interface without all the quests on it + A clickable text that will give items.
Can anyone help explain how to do this?
Im using a palidino76 508 source, if that helps. Thanks!

item.title: [Help Please] Quest Tab + Clickable Cmds
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Basically, click the quest again, then check the server.bat window and see the id. then search and ^^^ follow him.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help Please] Quest Tab + Clickable Cmds
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Get the id of the clicked text, make it resent the quest interface but with diff information and get the id of them aswell and make them w/e you want.

gameEngine.addItem(6070, 1);

for fire cape i believe, like that.

Read full topic
